title: I Have a Problem and i need help lol
body: So, when I control 1 or 2 or w/e to do the joke and taunt, my fps drop from 120 to 30 and my champion wont do the joke/taunt. I have laugh set to space bar and it works when i press it. my control button isnt broken because the champion mastery works. Is it bugged out  or ????. Sorry im terrible at explaining .-.

replies.body: What happens if you bind joke or taunt to another key altogether?  This might not be a binding issue, but potentially bad game files failing to not render some assets properly.  Let me know what happens!
Ya it works, I repaired my client ,and it didnt fix the issue.
